title: AFS: Introduction to Symposium: Roundtable on the Ethics of Senior Officer Resignation in the United States
description: Chad Kunsman, Editorial Assistant at Armed Forces & Society, interviews General James Dubik and Dr. Peter Feaver about their opposing viewpoints published in the symposium, "Roundtable on the Ethics of Senior Officer Resignation in the United States."
content:encoded: Chad Kunsman, Editorial Assistant at Armed Forces & Society, interviews General James Dubik and Dr. Peter Feaver about their opposing viewpoints published in the symposium, "Roundtable on the Ethics of Senior Officer Resignation in the United States."
